title: Who is the reincarnation of Adolf Hitler? - Quora

response.answer_text: Probably Arseniy Yatsenyuk[1] or Oleh Tyahnybok[2], leaders of the Svoboda [3] party of Ukraine. The Svodoba party was formerly known as the Social-National party and according to Der Spiegel, the "Social-National Party" title was an "intentional reference to Adolf Hitler's National Socialist party.” [4] While leaders of the Svoboda party, the party was accused of "openly glorifying Nazi murder" and "Nazi war criminals". According to Der Spiegel, "anti-Semitism is part of the extremist party's platform," which rejects certain minority and human rights. [5]The never-trumper, John McCain brought support and money to the Svoboda party with the help of the Obama administration. [6] [7] Footnotes[1] Arseniy Yatsenyuk - Wikipedia[2] Oleh Tyahnybok - Wikipedia[3] Svoboda (political party) - Wikipedia[4] 'Prepared to Die': The Right Wing's Role in Ukrainian Protests - SPIEGEL ONLINE - International[5] 'Prepared to Die': The Right Wing's Role in Ukrainian Protests - SPIEGEL ONLINE - International[6] John McCain Went To Ukraine And Stood On Stage With A Man Accused Of Being An Anti-Semitic Neo-Nazi[7] Why Is the US Sending $1 Billion to Ukraine?

I look at this a bit different. A reincarnated soul, may not display the same behavior, frame of mind, etc., as that soul was in its previous life. After we died, we are questioned by the masters how we view now our past life. I believe after a review, we all learn that we could have done many things differently. Therefore, if Hitler would one day reincarnate, he may become a priest, or a great humanist.
